Introduction to djangotailoring¶

djangotailoring is a package of django applications that wrap the functionality of the tailoring2 library.

Requirements¶

To use djangotailoring, you need the following packages available on the path:

  • Django >= 1.3
  • tailoring2
  • surveytracking
